ygData.subject: Re: Dufrenite
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok has anyone gone out and tryed this yet? I belive you have to go to Halas and buy the dufrenite then take it to Rathe and have it crushed, after that head
ygData.messageBody:
Ok has anyone gone out and tryed this yet? I belive you have to go to Halas
and buy the dufrenite then take it to Rathe and have it crushed, after that
head home and try to get the components for the gemchopper together and
make it. As for the tattered gnomish cloak, well you have me. I belive that
it may possibly be a tattered small cloak you have to use, and without a belt
because it is not in caps like all the other components in gimblestans book.
However this is just a suggestion and i am not certain that it will work. As
to where to find the tattered small cloak, well um... i don't know. Ask around
I am told it exists somewhere.

Grundup PuddlejumperTinkerholic - 99 skill in Tinkering and brother to pooden
